name: Using NFTs to Feed Hunger Instead of Greed - The Full Plate Project
description: Is Web3 just about the money? Or can it be leveraged to effect positive change in the real world? The Full Plate Project created by xBohiti is pushing the boundaries of what 'utility' in an NFT project can be. By using 80% of NFT sales and 100% of auction sales to buy food and supplies for people in need in Chicago, we are proving that  NFT collections can do more than "Number go up"

speakers.name: xBohiti
speakers.bio:
xBohiti is a Puerto Rican musician, 2D/3D artist, regenerative organic farmer, and web 3 entrepreneur from Chicago, Illinois. xBohiti creates music meant to motivate  and elevate consciousness.

xBohiti also goes by the name 'Spearit Bear' which was used when first releasing music but now that they have expanded beyond music they began using their real name: 'Bohiti' which translates to "Shaman" from the Native Borikua language in Puerto Rico.

As an Entrepreneur, xBohiti has created many different businesses throughout their career, some of which can be found at the bottom of this page.

xBohiti has an Advanced Permaculture Design Certification from the Advanced Permaculture Student Online as well as a Master's Certificate in Cannabis from Cannabis Training University, completing a Full Stack Developer Certificate and is working on new, exiting ways to put these skills to use.
